          <title>
            <string language="fr">Voir autour d'un coin avec un miroir</string>
            <string language="en">Seeing round a corner with a mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen ringsum eine Ecke mit einem Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ver em volta de um canto com um espelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedendo intorno ad un angolo con uno specchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει γύρω από μια γωνία με έναν 
καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ver alrededor de una esquina con un espejo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que le conducteur de la voiture bleue peut voir autour d'un coin en utilisant un miroir.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the driver of the blue car can see round a corner by using a mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">voiture</string>
            <string language="en">car</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">coin</string>
            <string language="en">corner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gestionnaire</string>
            <string language="en">driver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vue</string>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Treiber des blauen
Autos ringsum eine Ecke sehen kann, indem er einen Spiegel verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o excitador do carro 
azul pode ver em volta de um canto usando um espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il driver 
dell'automobile blu può vedere intorno ad un angolo usando uno 
specchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο οδηγός του μπλε 
αυτοκινήτου μπορεί να δει γύρω από μια γωνία με τη 
χρησιμοποίηση ενός καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el programa piloto 
del coche azul puede ver alrededor de una esquina usando un espejo.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
